statements.select: SELECT A.OWNER OWNER , A.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME , NVL(B.COMMENTS, ' ') TABLE_COMMENTS , 0 CREATED_DAYS , 0 MODIFY_DAYS FROM ALL_TABLES A , ALL_TAB_COMMENTS B WHERE A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME AND A.OWNER = B.OWNER AND B.TABLE_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND A.OWNER NOT IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR ( #EX_OWNER#, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL ) FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= REGEXP_COUNT ( #EX_OWNER#, ',' ) + 1) ORDER BY DECODE(A.OWNER, 'HSUP', 0, 'XSUP', 1 , 'HMED', 2, 'XMED', 3 , 'HCOM', 4, 'XCOM', 5 , 'HBIL', 6, 'XBIL', 7 , 10) , A.TABLE_NAME

select a.owner, a.column_name COL_NAME, decode(a.nullable, 'N', 'N', ' ') NULLABLE,
decode(a.data_type, 'VARCHAR2', a.data_type||'('||a.char_col_decl_length||')' , decode(a.data_type, 'NUMBER', a.data_type || decode(a.data_precision, null, '', '('||a.data_precision||','||a.data_scale||')') , a.data_type ) ) DATATYPE, substr(b.comments,1,100) COMMENTS , a.data_default "DEFAULT" from all_tab_columns a , all_col_comments b where b.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) and a.owner = #OWNER# and b.owner = a.owner and a.table_name = b.table_name and a.column_name = b.column_name AND a.owner = b.owner order by a.column_id

select distinct a.owner OWNER , a.name OBJ_NAME , a.type OBJ_TYPE , b.status STATUS from all_dependencies a ,all_objects b where b.object_name = a.name and a.referenced_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) and a.owner = b.owner and a.type = b.object_type union all select a.owner OWNER , a.trigger_name OBJ_NAME , 'TRIGGER' OBJ_TYPE , a.status STATUS from all_triggers a ,all_tables b where b.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) and a.table_name = b.table_name and a.owner = b.owner order by owner, obj_name

select a.index_name , a.column_name COL_NAME , b.comments from all_ind_columns a ,all_col_comments b where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) and a.index_owner = #OWNER# and a.index_owner = b.owner and a.table_name = b.table_name and a.column_name = b.column_name order by index_name, column_position

select 'TABLESPACE_NAME' col_name ,a.tablespace_name col_value from all_tables a where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) union all select 'STATUS' col_name ,a.status col_value from all_tables a where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) union all select 'NUM_ROWS' col_name ,to_char(a.num_rows) col_value from all_tables a where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) union all select 'TABLE_LOCK' col_name ,a.table_lock col_value from all_tables a where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) union all select 'LAST_ANALYZED' col_name ,to_char(a.last_analyzed,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') col_value from all_tables a where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) union all select 'PARTITIONED' col_name ,a.partitioned col_value from all_tables a where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) union all select 'COMPRESSION' col_name ,a.compression col_value from all_tables a where a.table_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) union all select 'CREATED' col_name ,to_char(created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') col_value from all_objects where object_name = upper(#TABLE_NAME#) and object_type = 'TABLE' union all select 'LAST_DDL_TIME' col_name ,to_char(last_ddl_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') col_value from all_objects where object_name = upper('MOEEXAMT') and object_type = 'TABLE'

SELECT AADP_CD /*발령부서코드*/ , HSP_TP_CD /*병원구분코드*/ , STF_NO /*직원번호*/ , RTRM_DT /*퇴직일자*/
, SID /*직원식별ID*/ , KOR_SRNM_NM /*한글성명*/ , AOA_WKDP_CD /*발령근무부서코드*/ , USE_GRP_CD /*사용그룹코드*/ , USE_GRP_DTL_CD /*사용그룹상세코드*/ , OCTY_TP_CD /*직종구분코드*/
, LGIN_PWD_LSH_DTM /*로그인비밀번호최종변경일시*/
, HR_PWD_LSH_DTM /*인사비밀번호최종변경일시*/
, SAL_PWD_LSH_DTM /*급여비밀번호최종변경일시*/
, EXPS_USE_DEPT_CD /*경비사용부서코드*/ , EXPS_USE_WKDP_CD /*경비사용근무부서코드*/ , STF_NKNM /*직원별명*/ , OFWK_GRP_YN /*서무그룹여부*/ , LGL_KOR_NM /*법적한글명*/ , SNDP_IFY_CD /*동명이인식별코드*/ , BLACK_SGNT_PATH_NM /*흑색서명경로명*/ , WHITE_SGNT_PATH_NM /*백색서명경로명*/ , MAIN_PLWK_HSP_YN /*주근무지병원여부*/ , FSR_DTM /*최초등록일시*/ , FSR_STF_NO /*최초등록직원번호*/ , FSR_PRGM_NM /*최초등록프로그램명*/ , FSR_IP_ADDR /*최초등록IP주소*/ , LSH_DTM /*최종변경일시*/ , LSH_STF_NO /*최종변경직원번호*/ , LSH_PRGM_NM /*최종변경프로그램명*/ , LSH_IP_ADDR /*최종변경IP주소*/ , OCRS_YN /*직책여부*/ FROM CNLRRUSD
WHERE (HSP_TP_CD = #HSP_TP_CD# OR #HSP_TP_CD# IS NULL ) AND (STF_NO LIKE '%' || #STF_NO# || '%' OR upper(KOR_SRNM_NM) LIKE '%' || upper(#STF_NO#) || '%' OR SID LIKE '%' || #STF_NO# || '%' ) ORDER BY HSP_TP_CD, KOR_SRNM_NM

SELECT HSP_TP_CD /*병원구분코드*/ , DEPT_CD /*부서코드*/ , HSPI_TP_CD /*병원내부구분코드*/ , DEPT_NM /*부서명*/ , DEPT_ENG_NM /*부서영문명*/ , UPR_DEPT_CD /*상위부서코드*/ , UPMS_DEPT_CD /*최상위부서코드*/ , DEPT_LVL_SEQ /*부서레벨순번*/ , DEPT_FLR_TP_CD /*부서층구분코드*/ , SORT_SEQ /*정렬순번*/ , USE_STOP_DT /*사용중지일자*/ , HIRA_MTD_CD /*심평원진료과코드*/ , HIRA_INMED_DTL_CD /*심평원내과상세코드*/ , HIRA_MTFL_CD /*심평원진료분야코드*/ , IMGN_DEPT_YN /*가상부서여부*/ , MDCT_DEPT_CD /*의료원부서코드*/ , MTD_UPR_DEPT_CD /*진료과상위부서코드*/ , MED_DEPT_CD /*진료부서코드*/ , MED_DEPT_TP_CD /*진료부서구분코드*/ , SMS_SHIP_DEPT_NM /*SMS발송부서명*/ , FMR_DEPT_CD /*이전부서코드*/ , NEXTG_FMR_DEPT_CD /*차세대이전부서코드*/ , GW_DEPT_CD /*그룹웨어부서코드*/ , FSR_DTM /*최초등록일시*/ , FSR_STF_NO /*최초등록직원번호*/ , FSR_PRGM_NM /*최초등록프로그램명*/ , FSR_IP_ADDR /*최초등록IP주소*/ , LSH_DTM /*최종변경일시*/ , LSH_STF_NO /*최종변경직원번호*/ , LSH_PRGM_NM /*최종변경프로그램명*/ , LSH_IP_ADDR /*최종변경IP주소*/ FROM PDEDBMSM WHERE (HSP_TP_CD = #HSP_TP_CD# OR #HSP_TP_CD# IS NULL ) AND (DEPT_CD LIKE '%' || UPPER(#DEPT_CD#) || '%' OR UPPER(DEPT_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#DEPT_CD#) || '%' OR UPPER(DEPT_ENG_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#DEPT_CD#) || '%' ) ORDER BY HSP_TP_CD, DEPT_NM

/*자동출고대상여부(Z:시스템적용전,U:미확인,Y:자동출고대상,N:자동출고비대상)*/ FROM MDEXMORT WHERE PATNO = #PATNO# AND ORDDATE = #INDATE# AND ORDSEQNO in (Select ORDSEQNO From sgactcdt Where PATNO = #PATNO# and INDATE = #INDATE# and JOHAPTYPE = '1' and INSPTYPE = #SGTYPE# and INSEQ = #SGCNT# and OCSYN = 'Y')

SELECT PATNO /*환자번호*/ , TO_CHAR(INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INDATE /*내원일자*/ , INSPKIND /*검사종류*/ , INSEQ /*접수순번*/ , CANCELYN /*접수취소여부*/ , JOHAPTYPE /*조합구분*/ , RECSEQ /*영수순번*/ , TO_CHAR(PAPERDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') PAPERDT /*수납일자*/ , CARDTYPE /*신용카드종류*/ , CARDAMT /*신용카드사용금액*/ , AMT /*금액*/ , PAPERAMT /*전표금액*/ , PSAMT /*본인부담율*/ , JOHAPAMT /*조합청구액*/ , TO_CHAR(CASHDCDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CASHDCDATE /*현금취소일*/ , CASHAUTHNO /*현금승인번호*/ , CASHAMT /*현금승인금액*/ , FKFCS3001 /*카드정보*/ , HOSPCLS /*병원구분*/ , TO_CHAR(DWDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DWDATE /*DW 적용일자*/ , REGID /*등록자*/ , REGIP /*등록자 IP*/ , TO_CHAR(REGTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REGTIME /*등록일시*/ , EDITID /*수정자*/ , EDITIP /*수정자 IP*/ , TO_CHAR(EDITTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') EDITTIME /*수정일시*/ , FREEAMT /*무료암금액*/ , APPTYPE /*APPTYPE*/ , ACCREQNO /*현금영수승인자료*/ , CARDAPPNO /*카드승인번호*/ , CARDNO /*카드번호*/ , JPCANCEL /*전표일자취소*/ , JIKWONAMT /*직원미수*/ , MISUAMT /*병원부담금*/ FROM SGRECEPT WHERE PATNO = #PATNO# AND INDATE = #INDATE# AND INSPKIND = #SGTYPE# AND INSEQ = #SGCNT# AND JOHAPTYPE = '1'
SELECT ARGUMENT_NAME , DATA_TYPE , IN_OUT FROM ALL_ARGUMENTS WHERE (PACKAGE_NAME IS NULL OR PACKAGE_NAME = NVL(#PKG_NAME#, PACKAGE_NAME)) AND OBJECT_NAME = upper(#PROC_NAME#) ORDER BY SEQUENCE
SELECT QUERYTEXT FROM FXQUERYSTORE WHERE UPPER(QUERYID) = UPPER(#QUERY_ID#)
SELECT QUERYID /* , QUERYTEXT */ FROM FXQUERYSTORE WHERE UPPER(QUERYTEXT) LIKE '%' || upper(#QUERYTEXT#) || '%'

SELECT '1' GBN , OWNER , NAME , TYPE , LINE , REPLACE(TEXT, CHR(10), '') TEXT FROM ALL_SOURCE WHERE UPPER(TEXT) LIKE '%' || upper(#TEXT#) || '%'
UNION SELECT '2' GBN , OWNER , VIEW_NAME NAME , 'VIEW' TYPE , 0 LINE , REPLACE(SUBSTR(TEXT_VC, 1, 100), CHR(10), '') || '...' TEXT FROM ALL_VIEWS WHERE XSUP.FT_GET_VIEWTEXT(VIEW_NAME) LIKE '%' || upper(#TEXT#) || '%'
ORDER BY GBN, NAME, LINE
SELECT OWNER , NAME , TYPE , LINE , TEXT FROM ALL_SOURCE WHERE NAME = UPPER(#NAME#) AND TYPE NOT IN ('PACKAGE') /*PACKAGE HEADER는 제외*/ ORDER BY LINE

SELECT (SELECT RTRIM(XMLAGG ( XMLELEMENT(A, COLUMN_NAME || ', ') ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID).EXTRACT('//text()'), ', ') COL_INFO FROM ALL_TAB_COLUMNS A WHERE TABLE_NAME = #NAME#) COL_INFO , TEXT FROM ALL_VIEWS WHERE VIEW_NAME = #NAME#

SELECT BUSINESS_TYP /*업무구분코드*/ , MENU_CD /*메뉴코드*/ , BIZ_MENU_ID /*업무별메뉴ID*/ , MENU_ID /*메뉴ID*/ , MENU_NM /*메뉴명*/
, FOLDER_YN /*폴더여부*/ , UP_MENU_CD /*상위메뉴코드*/ , USE_YN /*메뉴표시여부*/ , SORT_SEQ /*메뉴정렬순서*/ , ASSEMBLY_NM /*어셈블리명*/ , APP_URL /*페이지경로*/ , ICON_URI /*아이콘경로*/ , MENU_TYPE /*MENU_TYPE*/ , DUP_YN /*중복실행여부*/ , MENU_OPEN_TYPE /*메뉴오픈구분*/ , DR_OPEN_TYPE /*진료메뉴오픈구분*/ , NR_OPEN_TYPE /*간호메뉴오픈구분*/ , MS_OPEN_TYPE /*진료지원메뉴오픈구분*/ , PA_OPEN_TYPE /*원무보험메뉴오픈구분*/ , RP_OPEN_TYPE /*ERP메뉴오픈구분*/ , MODAL_YN /*팝업모달여부*/ , WIN_VAL /*팝업윈도우사이즈*/ , TILE_FULL_SIZE_YN /*타일풀사이즈여부*/ , TILE_DEFAULT_SIZE /*타일기본사이즈*/ , TILE_MAX_SIZE /*타일최대사이즈*/ , TILE_MIN_SIZE /*타일최소사이즈*/ , SEARCH_DEFAULT_DURATION /*기본조회기간*/ , SEARCH_MAX_DURATION /*최대조회기간*/ , PATIENT_INFO_YN /*환자정보포함여부*/ , PRIVATE_INFO_YN /*개인정보포함여부*/ , MEDICAL_RECORD_YN /*의무기록포함여부*/ , ELECTRONIC_SIGNATURE_YN /*전자서명여부*/ , DISP_YN /*조회여부*/ , ACTIVE_YN /*액티브환자조회여부*/ , APPROVE_YN /*APPROVE_YN*/ , SYS_CD /*시스템코드*/ , USE_STR_DTM /*사용시작일시*/ , USE_END_DTM /*사용종료일시*/ , POPUP_ONLY_YN /*팝업전용여부*/ , QCK_MENU_YN /*퀵메뉴여부*/ , REPORT_YN /*리포트여부*/ , AUTH_CHECK_YN /*권한체크여부*/ , TITLE_DISP_YN /*타이틀표시여부*/ , PT_INFO_NEED_TYPE /*환자정보필요타입*/ , SCALE_DISP_YN /*배율표시여부*/ , KOR_FILE_NM /*한글파일명*/ , OGCP_FILE_PATH /*원본파일경로*/ , EMPL_FILE_PATH /*보기파일경로*/ , FILE_LTH /*파일길이*/ , REPEAT_SHOW_HIDE /*되풀이유형*/ , REPEAT_YEAR_MONTH /*되풀이방법*/ , REPEAT_START /*되풀이시작*/ , REPEAT_END /*되풀이종료*/ , PAGE_USAGE_RMKS /*페이지사용 비고*/ , AGGR_EXCEPT_YN /*집계제외필요*/ , DEPLOY_START_DTM /*화면운영시작일자*/ , MENU_DESC /*Service description*/ FROM EMBUMENT WHERE upper(MENU_CD) LIKE '%' || upper(#MENU_CD#) || '%' OR upper(MENU_NM) LIKE '%' || upper(#MENU_CD#) || '%' OR upper(ASSEMBLY_NM) LIKE '%' || upper(#MENU_CD#) || '%' OR upper(APP_URL) LIKE '%' || upper(#MENU_CD#) || '%' ORDER BY BUSINESS_TYP, MENU_CD

SELECT 'CCCCCSTE' TABLE_NM , COMN_GRP_CD /*공통그룹코드*/ , COMN_GRP_CD_NM /*공통그룹코드명*/ , COMN_GRP_CD_EXPL /*공통그룹코드설명*/ , UPR_COMN_GRP_CD /*상위공통그룹코드*/ , TEAM_TP_CD /*팀구분코드*/ , SBAR_NM /*주제영역명*/ , DTRL1_EXPL /*1번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL2_EXPL /*2번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL3_EXPL /*3번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL4_EXPL /*4번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL5_EXPL /*5번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL6_EXPL /*6번째업무규칙설명*/ FROM CCCCCLTC WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #COMN_GRP_CD# OR COMN_GRP_CD_NM LIKE '%' || #COMN_GRP_CD# || '%'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CCCMCSTE' TABLE_NM , COMN_GRP_CD /*공통그룹코드*/ , COMN_GRP_CD_NM /*공통그룹코드명*/ , COMN_GRP_CD_EXPL /*공통그룹코드설명*/ , UPR_COMN_GRP_CD /*상위공통그룹코드*/ , TEAM_TP_CD /*팀구분코드*/ , SBAR_NM /*주제영역명*/ , DTRL1_EXPL /*1번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL2_EXPL /*2번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL3_EXPL /*3번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL4_EXPL /*4번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL5_EXPL /*5번째업무규칙설명*/ , DTRL6_EXPL /*6번째업무규칙설명*/ FROM CCCMCLTC WHERE HSP_TP_CD = #HSP_TP_CD# AND (COMN_GRP_CD = #COMN_GRP_CD# OR COMN_GRP_CD_NM LIKE '%' || #COMN_GRP_CD# || '%')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'MSELMSID' TABLE_NM , LCLS_COMN_CD COMN_GRP_CD /*공통그룹코드*/ , LCLS_COMN_CD_NM COMN_GRP_CD_NM /*공통그룹코드명*/ , '' COMN_GRP_CD_EXPL /*공통그룹코드설명*/ , '' UPR_COMN_GRP_CD /*상위공통그룹코드*/ , 'LM' TEAM_TP_CD /*팀구분코드*/ , '' SBAR_NM /*주제영역명*/ , TH1_CTG_CD DTRL1_EXPL /*1번째업무규칙설명*/ , TH2_CTG_CD DTRL2_EXPL /*2번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL3_EXPL /*3번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL4_EXPL /*4번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL5_EXPL /*5번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL6_EXPL /*6번째업무규칙설명*/ FROM MSELMSCC WHERE HSP_TP_CD = #HSP_TP_CD# AND (LCLS_COMN_CD = #COMN_GRP_CD# OR LCLS_COMN_CD_NM LIKE '%' || #COMN_GRP_CD# || '%')
UNION ALL
SELECT 'MSCMCDCC' TABLE_NM , GRP_CD COMN_GRP_CD /*공통그룹코드*/ , GRP_CD_NM COMN_GRP_CD_NM /*공통그룹코드명*/ , '' COMN_GRP_CD_EXPL /*공통그룹코드설명*/ , '' UPR_COMN_GRP_CD /*상위공통그룹코드*/ , TEAM_TP_CD /*팀구분코드*/ , '' SBAR_NM /*주제영역명*/ , TH1_CTG_CD DTRL1_EXPL /*1번째업무규칙설명*/ , TH2_CTG_CD DTRL2_EXPL /*2번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL3_EXPL /*3번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL4_EXPL /*4번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL5_EXPL /*5번째업무규칙설명*/ , '' DTRL6_EXPL /*6번째업무규칙설명*/ FROM MSCMCGCC WHERE HSP_TP_CD = #HSP_TP_CD# AND (GRP_CD = #COMN_GRP_CD# OR GRP_CD_NM LIKE '%' || #COMN_GRP_CD# || '%') ORDER BY TABLE_NM, COMN_GRP_CD_NM

SELECT '' HSP_TP_CD , COMN_GRP_CD /*공통그룹코드*/ , COMN_CD /*공통코드*/ , COMN_CD_NM /*공통코드명*/ , COMN_CD_EXPL /*공통코드설명*/ , NVL(SCRN_MRK_SEQ, 999) SCRN_MRK_SEQ /*화면표시순번*/ , USE_YN /*사용여부*/ , DTRL1_NM /*1번째업무규칙명*/ , DTRL2_NM /*2번째업무규칙명*/ , DTRL3_NM /*3번째업무규칙명*/ , DTRL4_NM /*4번째업무규칙명*/ , DTRL5_NM /*5번째업무규칙명*/ , DTRL6_NM /*6번째업무규칙명*/ , NEXTG_FMR_COMN_CD /**/ FROM CCCCCSTE WHERE #TABLE_NM# = 'CCCCCSTE' AND COMN_GRP_CD = #COMN_GRP_CD# UNION ALL
SELECT HSP_TP_CD , LCLS_COMN_CD COMN_GRP_CD /*공통그룹코드*/ , SCLS_COMN_CD COMN_CD /*공통코드*/ , SCLS_COMN_CD_NM COMN_CD_NM /*공통코드명*/ , '' COMN_CD_EXPL /*공통코드설명*/ , NVL(SORT_SEQ, 999) SCRN_MRK_SEQ /*화면표시순번*/ , USE_YN /*사용여부*/ , TH1_RMK_CNTE DTRL1_NM /*1번째업무규칙명*/ , TH2_RMK_CNTE DTRL2_NM /*2번째업무규칙명*/ , TH3_RMK_CNTE DTRL3_NM /*3번째업무규칙명*/ , TH4_RMK_CNTE DTRL4_NM /*4번째업무규칙명*/ , TH5_RMK_CNTE DTRL5_NM /*5번째업무규칙명*/ , TH6_RMK_CNTE DTRL6_NM /*6번째업무규칙명*/ , '' NEXTG_FMR_COMN_CD /**/ FROM MSELMSID WHERE #TABLE_NM# = 'MSELMSID' AND HSP_TP_CD = #HSP_TP_CD# AND LCLS_COMN_CD = #COMN_GRP_CD# UNION ALL
SELECT HSP_TP_CD , GRP_CD COMN_GRP_CD /*공통그룹코드*/ , COMN_CD /*공통코드*/ , COMN_CD_NM /*공통코드명*/ , '' COMN_CD_EXPL /*공통코드설명*/ , NVL(SORT_SEQ, 999) SCRN_MRK_SEQ /*화면표시순번*/ , USE_YN /*사용여부*/ , TH1_RMK_CNTE DTRL1_NM /*1번째업무규칙명*/ , TH2_RMK_CNTE DTRL2_NM /*2번째업무규칙명*/ , TH3_RMK_CNTE DTRL3_NM /*3번째업무규칙명*/ , TH4_RMK_CNTE DTRL4_NM /*4번째업무규칙명*/ , TH5_RMK_CNTE DTRL5_NM /*5번째업무규칙명*/ , TH6_RMK_CNTE DTRL6_NM /*6번째업무규칙명*/ , '' NEXTG_FMR_COMN_CD /**/ FROM MSCMCDCC WHERE #TABLE_NM# = 'MSCMCDCC' AND HSP_TP_CD = #HSP_TP_CD# AND GRP_CD = #COMN_GRP_CD#
ORDER BY SCRN_MRK_SEQ, COMN_CD_NM

SELECT PT_NO /*환자번호*/ , IMGN_PT_YN /*가상환자여부*/
, PT_NM /*환자명*/ , SEX_TP_CD /*성별구분코드*/ , PT_BRDY_DT /*환자생일일자*/ , LNCL_BRDY_DT /*음력생일일자*/ , MDCT_PT_NO /*의료원환자번호*/ , IMGN_PT_CTG_CD /*가상환자분류코드*/ , PME_CLS_CD /*환자급종유형코드*/ , PSE_CLS_CD /*환자보조급종유형코드*/ , CTRC_ORG_CD /*계약기관코드*/ , BSC_CRCP_CTRA_CD /*기본현금영수증기준코드*/ , BSC_CRCP_NO /*기본현금영수증번호*/ , ADS_NOTM /*입원횟수*/ , LST_HME_DT /*최종수진일자*/ , DTH_YN /*사망여부*/ , DTH_DTM /*사망일시*/ , ABOB_TP_CD /*ABO식혈액형구분코드*/ , RHB_TP_CD /*RH식혈액형구분코드*/ , BBNK_BLTYP_KND_CD /*혈액은행혈액형종류코드*/ , BLTYP_EXM_DT /*혈액형검사일자*/ , BBNK_BLTYP_CNTE /*혈액은행혈액형내용*/ , PACT_TP_CD /*원무접수구분코드*/ , IDIF_UTLZ_CCRC_YN /*개인정보활용동의여부*/ , VIP_PT_YN /*VIP환자여부*/ , ENG_SRNM_NM /*영문성명*/ , DBTM_APY_YN /*당뇨병적용여부*/ , OOC_NTN_CD /*본국국가코드*/ , ENG_FST_NM /*영문최초명*/ , ENG_LST_NM /*영문최종명*/ , CTZN_REG_EXCP_YN /*주민등록예외여부*/ , SSCL_APFR_WRT_YN /*중증화상신청서작성여부*/ , SCFM_WRT_YN /*산정특례신청서작성여부*/ , SRPP_WRT_YN /*중증신청서작성여부*/ , MDC_SCFM_WRT_YN /*의료급여산정특례신청서작성여부*/ , INFC_YN /*감염여부*/ , PRGN_YN /*임신여부*/ , BRFD_YN /*수유여부*/ , ALRG_YN /*알러지여부*/ , BOBD_PT_NO /*합본이전환자번호*/ , BIND_DTM /*합본일시*/ , BIND_STF_NO /*합본직원번호*/ , FMR_PT_NM /*이전환자명*/ , PT_NM_CHG_DTM /*환자명변경일시*/ , HMPG_CUST_NO /*홈페이지고객번호*/ , SEC_PRBY_APCT_RRN /*암호화조산아신청인주민등록번호*/ , LST_HME_HSP_TP_CD /*최종수진병원구분코드*/ , CN_ADMN_ZN_NM /*중국행정구역명*/ , PBLM_PT_YN /*문제환자여부*/ , DNTN_PT_YN /*기부환자여부*/ , FSR_DTM /*최초등록일시*/ , FSR_STF_NO /*최초등록직원번호*/ , FSR_PRGM_NM /*최초등록프로그램명*/ , FSR_IP_ADDR /*최초등록IP주소*/ , LSH_DTM /*최종변경일시*/ , LSH_STF_NO /*최종변경직원번호*/ , LSH_PRGM_NM /*최종변경프로그램명*/ , LSH_IP_ADDR /*최종변경IP주소*/ , SEC_FRNR_ID_NO /*암호화외국인ID번호*/ , SEC_PSPT_NO /*암호화여권번호*/ , FSR_HSP_TP_CD /*최초등록병원구분코드*/ , LSH_HSP_TP_CD /*최종변경병원구분코드*/ , MOB_REG_YN /*모바일등록여부*/ , MOB_MSGR_SND_EXCP_YN /*모바일메신저전송예외여부*/ , WODI_YN /*해녀여부*/
FROM PCTPCPAM_DAMO WHERE PT_NO LIKE '%' || upper(#PT_NO#) || '%' OR PT_NM LIKE '%' || upper(#PT_NO#) || '%' ORDER BY PT_BRDY_DT

WITH W_DT AS ( SELECT DTM FROM CCCCDAYD WHERE DTM BETWEEN TO_DATE(#WK_STR_DTM#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#WK_END_DTM#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ), W_WORK AS ( SELECT WK_DT , SUM(DECODE(HDY_GBN, '1', 1, 0)) HDY_CNT , SUM(DECODE(HDY_GBN, '1', 0, 1)) WK_CNT FROM DAILYWORK WHERE WK_STF_ID = #WK_STF_ID# AND WK_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#WK_STR_DTM#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#WK_END_DTM#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 GROUP BY WK_DT ) SELECT TO_CHAR(DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WK_DT , TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') WK_DAY , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') = '1' THEN '일' WHEN TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') = '2' THEN '월' WHEN TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') = '3' THEN '화' WHEN TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') = '4' THEN '수' WHEN TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') = '5' THEN '목' WHEN TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') = '6' THEN '금' WHEN TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') = '7' THEN '토' END WK_DAY_TXT , CASE WHEN H.HDY_NM IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'Y' END HDY_YN , H.HDY_NM , CASE WHEN W.WK_DT IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'Y' END WK_EXIST_YN
, CASE WHEN W.WK_DT IS NULL OR TO_CHAR(DTM, 'D') IN ('1', '7') THEN '' WHEN HDY_CNT = 0 THEN '' WHEN HDY_CNT = WK_CNT THEN '연차' WHEN HDY_CNT > 9 THEN '연차' WHEN HDY_CNT >= 7 THEN '반차' WHEN HDY_CNT >= 1 THEN '반반차' END WK_RMK_CNTE FROM W_DT D , W_WORK W , CCCCCHOD H WHERE D.DTM = W.WK_DT(+) AND D.DTM = H.HDY_DT(+) AND '01' = H.HSP_TP_CD(+) AND 'Y' = H.HDY_YN(+) ORDER BY D.DTM

WITH TIME_SLOTS AS ( SELECT TO_DATE(#WK_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '8:30' HOUR TO MINUTE AS START_TIME, TO_DATE(#WK_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + INTERVAL '20:00' HOUR TO MINUTE AS END_TIME FROM DUAL ) SELECT 'N' SEARCH_MODE_YN , NVL(W.WK_STF_ID, #WK_STF_ID#) WK_STF_ID , NVL(W.WK_STF_NM, #WK_STF_NM#) WK_STF_NM , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(T.STR_DTM, 'HH24MI') >= '1730' THEN 'Y' END OVER_TM_YN , NVL(TO_CHAR(W.WK_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #WK_DT#) WK_DT , TO_CHAR(NVL(W.WK_STR_DTM, T.STR_DTM), 'HH24:MI') WK_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(NVL(W.WK_END_DTM, T.STR_DTM + INTERVAL '30' MINUTE), 'HH24:MI') WK_END_DTM , W.HDY_GBN , W.WK_GBN1 , W.WK_GBN2 , W.WK_GBN3 , W.WK_GBN4 , W.WK_GBN5 , W.WK_GBN6 , W.WK_GBN7 , W.WK_GBN8 , W.WK_GBN9 , W.WK_CNTE , W.WK_RMK_CNTE FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(#WK_DT# || ' ' || TO_CHAR(START_TIME + INTERVAL '30' MINUTE * (LEVEL - 1), 'HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') STR_DTM FROM TIME_SLOTS CONNECT BY START_TIME + INTERVAL '30' MINUTE * (LEVEL - 1) <= END_TIME ) T , DAILYWORK W WHERE W.WK_STF_ID (+)= #WK_STF_ID# AND W.WK_DT (+)= TO_DATE(#WK_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND W.WK_STR_DTM (+)= T.STR_DTM ORDER BY STR_DTM

SELECT 'Y' SEARCH_MODE_YN , W.WK_STF_ID , W.WK_STF_NM , 'N' OVER_TM_YN , TO_CHAR(W.WK_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WK_DT , TO_CHAR(W.WK_STR_DTM, 'HH24:MI') WK_STR_DTM , TO_CHAR(W.WK_END_DTM, 'HH24:MI') WK_END_DTM , W.HDY_GBN , W.WK_GBN1 , W.WK_GBN2 , W.WK_GBN3 , W.WK_GBN4 , W.WK_GBN5 , W.WK_GBN6 , W.WK_GBN7 , W.WK_GBN8 , W.WK_GBN9 , W.WK_CNTE , W.WK_RMK_CNTE FROM DAILYWORK W WHERE W.WK_STF_ID = #WK_STF_ID# AND (W.WK_CNTE LIKE '%' || #WK_CNTE# || '%' OR W.WK_RMK_CNTE LIKE '%' || #WK_CNTE# || '%') AND (#WK_GBN_MISS_YN# = 'N' OR ( #WK_GBN_MISS_YN# = 'Y' AND W.HDY_GBN IS NULL AND (W.WK_GBN1 IS NULL AND W.WK_GBN2 IS NULL AND W.WK_GBN3 IS NULL AND W.WK_GBN4 IS NULL AND W.WK_GBN9 IS NULL ) ) ) ORDER BY WK_STR_DTM

statements.update: DELETE /* DH.UPDATE.DAILYWORK.D01 */ FROM DAILYWORK WHERE WK_STF_ID = #WK_STF_ID# AND WK_DT = TO_DATE(#WK_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

INSERT /* DH.UPDATE.DAILYWORK.I01 */ INTO DAILYWORK ( WK_STF_ID /*직원ID*/ , WK_STF_NM /*직원명*/ , WK_DT /*업무일자*/ , WK_STR_DTM /*업무시작일시*/ , WK_END_DTM /*업무종료일시*/ , HDY_GBN /*휴가구분 1휴가*/ , WK_GBN1 /*업무구분 문의*/ , WK_GBN2 /*업무구분 개발*/ , WK_GBN3 /*업무구분 데이터*/ , WK_GBN4 /*업무구분 미팅*/ , WK_GBN5 /**/ , WK_GBN6 /**/ , WK_GBN7 /**/ , WK_GBN8 /**/ , WK_GBN9 /*업무구분 기타*/ , WK_CNTE /*업무내용*/ , WK_RMK_CNTE /*업무비고내용*/ , FSR_DTM /*최초등록일시*/ , FSR_STF_NO /*최초등록직원번호*/ , FSR_PRGM_NM /*최초등록프로그램명*/ , FSR_IP_ADDR /*최초등록IP주소*/ , LSH_DTM /*최종변경일시*/ , LSH_STF_NO /*최종변경직원번호*/ , LSH_PRGM_NM /*최종변경프로그램명*/ , LSH_IP_ADDR /*최종변경IP주소*/ ) VALUES ( #WK_STF_ID# , #WK_STF_NM# , TO_DATE(#WK_DT#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(#WK_DT# || ' ' || #WK_STR_DTM#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , TO_DATE(#WK_DT# || ' ' || #WK_END_DTM#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') , #HDY_GBN# , #WK_GBN1# , #WK_GBN2# , #WK_GBN3# , #WK_GBN4# , #WK_GBN5# , #WK_GBN6# , #WK_GBN7# , #WK_GBN8# , #WK_GBN9# , #WK_CNTE# , #WK_RMK_CNTE# , SYSDATE , #WK_STF_ID# , 'DH' , '0.0.0.0' , SYSDATE , #WK_STF_ID# , 'DH' , '0.0.0.0' )

statements.select: SELECT B.WK_STF_ID , NVL(B.WK_STF_NM, A.WK_STF_NM) WK_STF_NM FROM DAILYWORK A , (SELECT DISTINCT WK_STF_ID, WK_STF_NM FROM DAILYWORK WHERE WK_STF_ID != 'CC00000' ) B WHERE A.WK_STF_ID = 'CC00000' AND A.WK_STF_NM NOT LIKE '%예비%' AND A.WK_STF_NM = B.WK_STF_NM(+) ORDER BY 2
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(WK_CNTE) WK_CNTE FROM DAILYWORK WHERE WK_STF_ID = #WK_STF_ID# AND WK_CNTE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(WK_RMK_CNTE) WK_RMK_CNTE FROM DAILYWORK WHERE WK_STF_ID = #WK_STF_ID# AND WK_RMK_CNTE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1
